@graph.headline: Shopify Silos – The Best Way To Create Them & Why They Work For Improved Rankings & Traffic
@graph.description: Learn how to create effective Shopify silo architecture for improved SEO rankings and traffic. Discover the best methods, benefits, and solutions for implementing website silos in Shopify stores.

@graph.name: Shopify Silos – The Best Way To Create Them & Why They Work
How to Create Shopify Silos
@graph.description: Step-by-step guide to building effective silo architecture in Shopify stores

step.name: Conduct Keyword Research
step.text: Identify how to group topics and keywords together. Research core broad topics and their subtopics.

step.name: Create Main Collections
step.text: Set up your main category collections in Shopify based on your keyword research.

step.name: Add Products to Collections
step.text: Ensure all relevant products are added to the main collections.

step.name: Create Sub-Collections with Tags
step.text: Add specific tags to products to create sub-collections with URL structure like /collections/main-category/tag

step.name: Optimize Tag Pages
step.text: Use Optizen app to customize SEO meta information, titles, and descriptions for each tag page.

acceptedAnswer.text: Website silo architecture is the concept of grouping related information into distinct sections within a website. It involves dividing your website into main or core topics, and then creating supporting content for those core topics.

mainEntity.name: How do Shopify silos benefit SEO?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify silos improve SEO by enhancing topical relevance, improving link equity flow, and helping with longer tail keyword rankings. They provide search engines an efficient way to identify topical relevance on your site.

mainEntity.name: What are the two main methods for building Shopify silos?

acceptedAnswer.text: Method 1 uses the default /collections/ structure with internal linking. Method 2 uses Shopify tags to create a hierarchical URL structure like /collections/main-category/tag, which is the preferred method for true silo architecture.

mainEntity.name: What is the main downside of using Shopify tags for silos?

acceptedAnswer.text: The main downside is that you can't edit or modify the tag pages to create unique SEO meta information. By default, tag pages mirror the main collection for all SEO information, creating duplicate content issues.
